title: Game Scoop! 689: The Cowabunga Discussion
description:
This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Sam Claiborn, Justin Davis,  and Mark Medina -- are discussing TMNT: The Cowabunga Collection, Cult of the Lamb, Arcade Paradise, The Last of Us Part 1, and more. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions.

 

Daemon on Twitter: @DaemZero

0:00:00 - Intro/TMNT: The Cowabunga Collection

0:15:39 - Cult of the Lamb, Arcade Paradise

0:27:09 - The Last of Us Part 1

0:36:27 - Assassin's Creed Mirage

0:41:31 - How to get into pinball collecting

0:47:57 - Video Game 20 Questions
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (Daemon Hatfield)
